data.message:
Hey Em, these are some of my words:

The money comes and goes, it's not mine it's not yours..it's to the one who gives to all, the one, the only, the G.O.D..he's taking a good care of me..even though am not how he wannit me to be..my mom prayers  at the Don without her i'll be gone..am sorry mama if i ever made you cry, am sorry if i ever made you sad..am not that bad..am just mad mama, that i can't push my self to reach my goals..to open my doors...to many stores and no body sales happiness, OH! Sorry i forgot about the liquor stores and coke dealers, the nike shoe factory and the porn industry..i dreamed about a lot of things,but only nightmares happened to me
